MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
VESSEL, 200 PERSONS ON BOARD, SINKING IN
34-58.0N 012-37.8E. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT. ASSIST
IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 39 065 908 4527 OR
39 065 908 4409, FAX: 03 906 592 2737 OR
3906 5908 4791, E-MAIL: UFFICIO3.REPARTO3@MIT.GOV.IT.
